php-timezone.description: The main timezone for the size

senape-basepath.description: Path to the main Senape directory, where the code resides. Should normally not be set by the user

senape-basepath-src.description: Path to the directory conaining the src/ directory. Should never be set by the user

senape-basepath-loading-file.description: Path to the file loading Senape set by passing __FILE__. Used to define where Senape is installed. If not set, vendor/aoloe/php-senape/src/ is used.

senape-basepath-themes.description: Path to the themes directory. Relative to ??? or absolute.

senape-http-themes.description: HTTP path to the themes directory. Relative to ??? or absolute.

senape-basepath-data.description: Path to the directory conaining the data directory. Relative to the main Senape.php file or absolute.

storage.description: How to store the data (json, mysql)

storage-json-data-path.description: Path to the directory conaining the comments. Relative to the main Senape.php file or absolute.

comment-message-no-comment.description: Path to the directory conaining the comments. Relative to the main Senape.php file or absolute.
comment-message-no-comment.value: Be the first to leave a comment.

ui-theme.description: HTML and CSS theme the interface

senape-site-valid-list.description: List of valid hosts that can add comments to this service: they are matched from the right to the current host

senape-site-current.description: The site from where the request is coming. This value is set by Senape::setSite(); initialized to the site where Senape is installed..

senape-page-current.description: The page from where the request is coming. This value must be set by Senape::setPage() or in the Javascript arguments.
